narrative: Test narrative for porters five forces

threat_new_entrants.title: Threat of New Entrants
threat_new_entrants.description: Moderate barriers including capital requirements and brand loyalty limit new competition

supplier_power.title: Bargaining Power of Suppliers
supplier_power.description: Low power due to multiple alternative suppliers and standardized components

competitive_rivalry.title: Competitive Rivalry
competitive_rivalry.description: High intensity with numerous competitors competing on price, quality, and innovation

buyer_power.title: Bargaining Power of Buyers
buyer_power.description: Strong buyer power driven by price sensitivity and low switching costs

threat_substitutes.title: Threat of Substitutes
threat_substitutes.description: Growing threat from alternative solutions offering similar value at lower cost
